products.title: Perfect Fit Black
products.description: With their slick, polished look and dark intensity, this blind will add a dramatic vibe to your home in an instant. The black slats are pure and plain, satin-finished and stylish, perfect for a modern look based on clean lines and crisp colours. The perfect fit system provides you with their slick, polished look and dark intensity, this blind will add a dramatic vibe to your home in an instant.

products.title: Perfect Fit Black
products.description: As becoming as a little black dress, this matt black venetian blind will clothe your conservatory with a sophisticated air, and maybe just a touch of drama and excitement too.

products.title: Cosmos Black Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: If youre looking for some bold glamour for your home then the cosmic chic of this stunning and clever blind will be right up your street. The gently glittering slats sparkle subtly and stylishly, catching the light and changing the look of the slats with every turn. A surround if youre looking for some bold glamour for your home then the cosmic chic of this stunning and clever blind will be right up your street.

products.title: Cosmos Black Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: This unique venetian blind has sparkling slats that change colour with every turn. The dark shade will give your room an elegant look and match easily with any kind of furniture you choose.
